body:
Since the helper method is already doing quite a lot, I would suggest to also move `join` and `html_safe` there. It looks kind of weird to me, having a rather long method called `links_to_conferences` not returning the actual links in a *"view-ready*" format.

What do you think?

It would also make this list item a bit cleaner:
```ruby
li = "#{link_to user.name, user}: #{link_to_conferences(user.conferencs.in_current_season)}
```
